name: ts-io-error
description: defines errors incurring in client-server communication.
author: Federico Sordillo <federicosordillo@gmail.com>

scripts.test-package-in-lib: test -f lib/package.json || echo "no need to publish"
scripts.npm-publish-beta: ls && cat .npmrc && yarn test-package-in-lib && npm publish lib --tag beta
scripts.postversion: cp package.json lib && cp ../../.npmrc . && cp -r lib lib2 && mv lib2 lib/lib
